title: Google Pixel 1 problems (wifi, vibration, keeps restarting)
content: I bought my Pixel on Ebay. Then i tried to change battery for new bc old one was bad enogh, so i couldnt, then vibration stopped to work. Totally. Then if i turn on wifi (which doesnt see none of the spots ), phone starts restarting, and sometimes even if i dont turn on wifi phone keeps restarting. In safe mode if i turn on wifi phone doesnt restart, but stil doesnt see wifi networks. Does someone know what is the probleme?(Vibration, i miss vibration)
